definition: ilium/outermost bone of the pelvic girdle/Taiwan pr. [ka4]
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
iliac fossa (anatomy)/pelvic basin internal to ilium

sentences.english: To explore the feasibility of ligating and embedding a pump in the iliac artery by laparoscopic.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腹腔鏡髂內動脈結紮及置泵可行性。

sentences.english: Iliopsoas tendinitis is a common injury in sport.
sentences.chinese: 髂腰肌肌腱炎是一種常見的運動損傷。

sentences.english: Healing the sacroiliac joint takes constant vigilance.
sentences.chinese: 骶髂關節的治療需要時刻保持警惕。

sentences.english: The iliopsoas is also separated from the capsule by blunt dissection and retracted medially.
sentences.chinese: 髂腰肌也從關節囊上被鈍性剝離並向內側牽開。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the clinical application of ili oinguinal abdominal bilobate flap to repair hand skin defect.
sentences.chinese: 目的應用髂腹部帶蒂雙葉皮瓣修復手部皮膚缺損。

sentences.english: Pyogenic sacroiliitis is a rarely occurring disease.
sentences.chinese: 化膿性骶髂關節炎是一種很少發生的疾病。

sentences.english: This kind of separation is, by definition, sacroiliac dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 理論上說，這種分離理論上就是骶髂關節功能紊亂。

sentences.english: Colour duplex ultrasonography showed DVT extending from the left external iliac vein to the foretibial vein.
sentences.chinese: 多普勒彩超顯示左側髂外靜脈至脛前靜脈段DVT。

sentences.english: Results There is abundant blood supply in the ilioinguinal region.
sentences.chinese: 結果髂腹股溝區存在着豐富的血供。

sentences.english: Objective To analysis the results of treating the both-column fractures of acetabulum via ilioinguinal approach.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析經髂腹股溝入路治療髖臼雙柱骨折的療效。

sentences.english: This can be a lightening rod for sacroiliac pain.
sentences.chinese: 它是骶髂疼痛的避雷針。

sentences.english: There should be a bursa here, which makes it easy for the iliotibial band to slide and the leg to move easily.
sentences.chinese: 那裏，有一個可以方便髂脛束滑動和腿部動作的滑囊。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic value of CT on enlarged iliopsoas bursa.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討髂腰肌囊擴張的CT表現及診斷價值。

sentences.english: Iliac crest autograft bone has traditionally been used for lumbar fusion.
sentences.chinese: 自體髂嵴骨移植成爲腰椎融合的傳統方法。

sentences.english: The anterior iliofemoral approach utilizes the interval between the sartorius muscle and the tensor fascia lata muscle.
sentences.chinese: 前方髂股入路利用了縫匠肌和闊筋膜張肌之間的間隙。

sentences.english: The principal muscles involved in hip flexion are the psoas and the iliacus, collectively known as the iliopsoas .
sentences.chinese: 主要涉及肌肉，在髖關節屈曲的腰肌和髂，統稱爲髂。

definition: kneecapping/to cut or smash the kneecaps as corporal punishment
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
semitendinosus, one of the hamstring muscles in the thigh
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
